name: richy
description: Richy is a self-hosted rich text editor for blogs or content management. It supports Markdown, HTML, custom styles, and a simple WYSIWYG UI for publishing entries.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Create content with a visual editor that shows final formatting in real-time

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Write in Markdown for faster content creation with plain text

features.title: Html Editing
features.description: Switch to HTML mode for advanced formatting and custom styling

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Add images directly to posts with drag-and-drop functionality

features.title: Draft Management
features.description: Save work in progress and publish when ready

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize posts with tags and categories for easy navigation
